title: Slow cooker clam chowder
ingredients: ['110g bacon, diced', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 1/2 (280g) tins baby clams, chopped and liquid reserved', '3 large potatoes, diced', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 carrots, thinly sliced', '3 sticks celery with leaves, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt, or to taste', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves', '1 bay leaf']
